description: This file defines the IGuide interface within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace, providing methods for TV guide functionalities such as program retrieval, parental controls, and notifications.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: Interface for TV guide controls, providing methods to access channel and program info, parental controls, and event notifications.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for guide events such as broadcasts, alerts, and parental control changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser with a given shell context.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves the list of available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves the list of current programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Retrieves information about the current program for a specific channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available audio languages for a given program identifier.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available subtitle languages for a given program.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is active.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks a specific parental control.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a specific parental control is locked.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification listener for guide events.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
